title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: What is the general solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the fraction with numerator x times the cosine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, and denominator 4 y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="y greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, one half, times the square root of the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msqrt><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, the square root of one fourth, times the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, plus C, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, one eighth, times the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, C times e raised to the one eighth, times the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, the square root of one fourth, times the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis, plus C, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
